text: Argemiro Pinheiro da Silva known as Argemiro (3 June 1915 - 4 July 1975)CBF profile was a Brazilian football player. He played for the Brazil national team at the 1938 FIFA World Cup finals. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Footballers from Ribeir√£o Preto
title: Argemiro
